# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its exceptional quality and features, I believe it's worth more than $150. However, for you, I am willing to consider a special introductory price of $120. This is an exclusive offer tailored just for you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer
